column2: "Me Nyankopɔn
column5: ɔyɛ dɛn na apa me yi? Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na ɔwo enye mo mboa na me nkekamu ntamu atwe yi?"

column2: "Ao
"Eso ɔwo eyɛ krɔnkrɔn
column4: Na ɔwo na Israel ayɛyi nyinara dzi wɔ wo."

column2: "Hɛn egyanom tweer wo: Wɔtweer wo
"Wosui frɛɛ wo
column3: na wonyaa nkwagye: Wɔdze hɔn werɛ hyɛɛ wo mu

column2: "Naaso emi dze
column4: na nnyɛ nyimpa bi; Nyimpa mu ɔsesɛba

column2: "Hɔn a wohu me nyinara si me atwetwe: Wɔseberseber hɔn ano
"Oyi
column3: opireew noho too EWURADZE do; ma ɔngye no ɛ: Sɛ ɔpɛ n'asɛm a

column2: "Eso
column3: ɔwo nye nyia oyii me fii me na yamu: Mutua me na n'enumfoano no

column2: "Ofi yafun mu ara na wɔtoow me kyeen wo do: Ɔwo nye me Nyankopɔn dze fi me na yamu."
"Ao
column3: mma nnye me ntamu nntwe; na ɔfona abɛn; Na ɔboafo biara nnyi hɔ a ɔbɔboa me."

column2: "Anantwinyin pii etwa mo ho ehyia: Basan anantwinyin akataban etwa ayer me."
"Wɔhanhan hɔn anomu wɔ mo do
"Woehue me egu dɛ nsu
column3: Me mbiew nyinara ehuhuan efi n'akwaa do: Na m'akoma ayɛ dɛ nku a anan."

column2: "M'ahoɔdzen asa dɛ ehina a abobɔ; Na me gyirama afam m'adadaw mu; Na ɔwo edze me ato owu huntuma mu."
"Ndzebɔnyɛfo etwa mo ho ehyia: Tse dɛ mbɔdɔmkuw no
column3: wɔbɔ mu ba mo do; Wotuetue me nsa na m'anan mu."

column2: "Mutum kan me mbiew nyinara; M'atamfo hwɛ me
"Wɔkyɛ m'akataho mu fa
column3: Na m'atar ho na wɔtwe tonto."

column2: "Na ao
"Yi me kra fi afona ano; Gye mo nkwa fi dɛm mbɔdɔm no tum ase."
"Gye me fi ogyata no n'anomu; Na me kra a ɔrehaahaa no fi nantwibɔyafo no mmbɛn mu."
"Mobɔbɔ wo dzin makyerɛ mo nkorɔfo: Mbrɛ dɔm hyia som wo no na mebɛkamfo wo."
"Hom a hom dzi EWURADZE nyi na hom som no
column5: hom nhyɛ no enyimnyam: Na hom Israel asefo nyinara
column6: hom mfa enyidzi kɛse mma no."

column2: "Na ɔmandzehufo n'amandzehu no
column4: eso oennkyir; Nkyii so ɔammfa n'enyim ennhuntsa no; Na mbom aber a osui frɛɛ no no

column2: "Ɔwo nye m'ayɛyi ne farbae na no botae wɔ mboanofo kɛse no mu; Mebɛma m'anohobadze wɔ hɔn a wosuro wo no enyim."
"Abrɛfo no bedzidzi na wɔaamee; Hɔn a wɔhwehwɛ EWURADZE ekyir kwan no
column3: beyi no ayɛw: Nyankopɔn mma hom ndzepa daa."

column2: "Asaase ano noho nyinara wɔbɛkaa EWURADZE: Wofi wiadze ne nfɛndzeanan nyinara bɛsan aba no hɔ; Na amanaman mbusuakuw nyinara bɔsɔr no."
"Osiandɛ ahendzi no yɛ EWURADZE dze: Na ɔno na odzi amanaman do hen."
"Nyew
column3: ɔno na ahomemadofo nyinara mpo bɔkotow no; Nyimpa dasanyi biara bɔkotow wɔ n'enyim
column5: nyia ɔnoara nntum nnkora ne kra do no a."

column2: "Nkyirmba bɔsom no; Wɔbɛka EWURADZE ho asɛm akyerɛ mbasantsen a odzi do no."
"Wɔbɛba na wɔabɛka ne ndzeyɛtsenenee akyerɛ ɔman a wɔbɔwo hɔn no
